description.original_author: Faculty of Organizational Sciences, University of Maribor, Slovenia
description.other_details: Slovenia, Ljubljana, Clinical centre, Pediatrics hospital, Hemato ward (nurse Leon)

details.purpose: *Details of a brief mouth assessment to assess stomatitis level according to WHO scale. Includes some other elements of mouth assessment.(sl)
Details of a brief mouth assessment to assess stomatitis level according to WHO scale. Includes some other elements of mouth assessment.

items.items: *Ne govori zaradi drugih razlogov (premlad, gluhonem, ne zeli)
*Izracunan stadij stomatitisa po WHO klasifikaciji. Vrednost 0 predstavlja odsotnost stomatitisa.
Aditional tissue findings specific to gums
Differences from normal patient's voice, difficulties due to stomatitis
Incapable of speaking due to stomatitis
Doesn't speak for other reason than stomatitis (to young, deaf, doesn't want to speak)
Calculated level of stomatitis according to WHO. Level 0 means no stomatitis. (ian said it's ok, but could be ordinal)
Image, video or other multimedia elements
